title: Drawing, "Costume Design for Castle, for Checkmate", 1937
medium: Brush and gouache, graphite on white paper
signed: Signed in black ink, lower right: E. Mcknight Kauffer
inscribed: Inscribed in black ink, lower right: Caslte- "Checkmate"
creditline: Gift of Mrs. E. McKnight Kauffer
description: Costume design in red, orange, and yellow for castle. Model wears a mask and headgear in the shape of a crenellated tower in red, orange, and yellow, with a black standard. His tunic consists of a brick pattern on the left and orange with black discs on the right. He wears gloves, and in his right hand holds an ax in graphite. In the lower right margin, a small version of the costume in graphite can be seen from the back, inscriptions: light red / dark red.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Costume Design for Castle, for Checkmate", 1937.
1937. Brush and gouache, graphite on white paper. Gift of Mrs. E. McKnight Kauffer. 1963-39-280.
